entities.name: fudge
entities.description: A government official who is forcing the Daily Prophet to keep quiet about news related to Voldemort.

entities.name: rita
entities.description: A journalist who will not be silenced by Fudge.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: A student who was involved in a tournament and is mentioned as being left out of the news about Harry.
